gobblin.cluster

Class GobblinHelixJobScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.scheduler.JobScheduler
        • gobblin.cluster.GobblinHelixJobScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service

    @Alpha
public class GobblinHelixJobScheduler
extends JobScheduler
    An extension to JobScheduler that schedules and runs Gobblin jobs on Helix using GobblinHelixJobLaunchers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gobblin.scheduler.JobScheduler
